content:
Yield, 75%; m.p. 154–156°C. Anal. Calc. For C14H12N2Br2O4Sn: C, 30.53; H, 2.20; N, 5.09. Found: C, 30.48; H, 2.23; N, 5.08. 1H-NMR (400 MHz, CDCl3), δ ppm (multiplicity, integration, assignment): 8.58–9.23 (m, 6H, Py–H), 0.84 (m, 6H, Sn–CH3). IR (KBr, cm−1): v(COO)as, 1631, 1580; v(COO)s,1420; v(Sn–O), 455; v(Sn–C), 550; v(Sn–N), 480.

[n-Bu<sub>2</sub>Sn(OCOC<sub>5</sub>H<sub>3</sub>N-3-Br-5)<sub>2</sub>]<sub><italic>n</italic></sub><bold>(2)</bold>

Yield, 67%; m.p. 170–171°C. Anal. Calc. For C20H24N2Br2O4Sn: C, 37.83; H, 3.81; N, 4.41. Found: C, 37.78; H, 3.84; N, 4.42. 1H-NMR (400 MHz, CDC13), δ ppm (multiplicity, integration, assignment): 8.56–9.24 (m, 6H, Py–H), 0.86–1.79 (m, 18H, Sn–C4H9). IR (KBr, cm−1): v(COO)as, 1634, 1587; v(COO)s, 1440; v(Sn–O), 465; v(Sn–C), 558; v(Sn–N), 485.

[Ph<sub>2</sub>Sn(OCOC<sub>5</sub>H<sub>3</sub>N-3-Br-5)<sub>2</sub>]<sub><italic>n</italic></sub><bold>(3)</bold>

Yield, 73%; m.p. 178–180°C. Anal. Calc. For C24H16N2Br2O4Sn: C, 42.71; H, 2.39; N, 4.15. Found: C, 42.71; H, 2.36; N, 4.17. 1H-NMR (400 MHz, CDC13), δ ppm (multiplicity, integration, assignment): 8.57–9.28 (m, 6H, Py–H), 7.40–7.80 (m, 10H, Sn–C6H5). IR (KBr, cm−1): v(COO)as, 1637, 1585; v(COO)s, 1442; v(Sn–O), 460; v(Sn–C), 561; v(Sn–N), 487.

[n-Oc<sub>2</sub> Sn(OCOC<sub>5</sub>H<sub>3</sub>N-3-Br-5)<sub>2</sub>]<sub><italic>n</italic></sub><bold>(4)</bold>

Yield, 80%; m.p. 150–151°C. Anal. Calc. For C28H40N2Br2O4Sn: C, 45.01; H, 5.40; N, 3.75. Found: C, 44.98; H, 5.45; N, 3.72. 1H-NMR (400 MHz, CDCl3), δ ppm (multiplicity, integration, assignment): 8.54–9.26 (m, 6H, Py–H), 0.82–1.80 (m, 18H, Sn–C8H17).. IR (KBr, cm−1): v(COO)as, 1632, 1581; v(COO)s, 1446; v(Sn–O), 463; v(Sn–C), 558; v(Sn–N), 483.

{[Me<sub>2</sub>Sn(OH<sub>2</sub>)(OCOC<sub>5</sub>H<sub>3</sub>N-3-Br-5)<sub>2</sub>]<sub>2</sub>}<sub><italic>n</italic></sub><bold>(5)</bold>

Yield, 77%; m.p. 161–162°C. Anal. Calc. For C28H28N4Br4O10Sn2: C, 29.56; H, 2.48; N, 4.92. Found: C, 29.53; H, 2.51; N, 4.93. 1H-NMR (400 MHz, CDCl3), δ ppm (multiplicity, integration, assignment): 8.56–9.24 (m, 12H, Py–H), 0.81 (s, 12H, Sn–CH3), 12.01–13.22 (m, 4H, SnOH2). IR (KBr, cm−1): v(O–H), 3368, v(COO)as, 1629, 1583; v(COO)s, 1320; v(Sn–O), 450; v(Sn–OH2), 485; v(Sn–C), 552; v(Sn–N), 478.

{[n-Bu<sub>2</sub>Sn(OH<sub>2</sub>)(OCOC<sub>5</sub>H<sub>3</sub>N-3-Br-5)<sub>2</sub>]<sub>2</sub>}<sub><italic>n</italic></sub><bold>(6)</bold>

Yield, 68%; m.p. 183–184°C. Anal. Calc. For C40H52N4Br4O10Sn2: C, 36.79; H, 4.01; N, 4.29. Found: C, 36.75; H, 4.03; N, 4.27. 1H-NMR (400 MHz, CDCl3), δ ppm (multiplicity, integration, assignment): 8.54–9.25 (m, 12H, Py–H), 0.86–1.79 (m, 36H, Sn–C4H9), 12.00–13.20 (m, 4H, SnOH2). IR (KBr, cm−1): v(O–H), 3370, v(COO)as, 1634, 1587; v(COO)s, 1340; v(Sn–O), 465; v(Sn–OH2), 483; v(Sn–C), 558; v(Sn–N), 485.

[Ph<sub>2</sub>Sn(OH<sub>2</sub>)(OCOC<sub>5</sub>H<sub>3</sub>N-3-Br-5)<sub>2</sub>]<sub>2</sub>}<sub><italic>n</italic></sub><bold>(7)</bold>

Yield, 76%; m.p. 175–176°C. Anal. Calc. For C48H36N4Br4O10Sn2: C, 41.60; H, 2.62; N, 4.04. Found: C, 41.58; H, 2.65; N, 4.07. 1H-NMR (400 MHz, CDCl3), δ ppm (multiplicity, integration, assignment): 8.55–9.25 (m, 12H, Py–H), 7.4–7.77 (m, 20H, Sn–C6H5), 12.05–13.21 (m, 4H, SnOH2). IR (KBr, cm−1): v(O–H), 3366, v(COO)as, 1635, 1583; v(COO)s, 1343; v(Sn–O), 475; v(Sn–OH2), 482; v(Sn–C), 558; v(Sn–N), 495.

{[n-Oc<sub>2</sub>Sn(OH<sub>2</sub>)(OCOC<sub>5</sub>H<sub>3</sub>N-3-Br-5)<sub>2</sub>]<sub>2</sub>}<sub><italic>n</italic></sub><bold>(8)</bold>

Yield, 78%; m.p. 163–164°C. Anal. Calc. For C56H84N4Br4O10Sn2: C, 43.95; H, 5.53; N, 3.66. Found: C, 43.91; H, 5.50; N, 3.68. 1H-NMR (400 MHz, CDC13), δ ppm (multiplicity, integration, assignment): 8.56–9.24 (m, 12H, Py–H), 0.83–1.79 (m, 68H, Sn–C8H17), 12.03–13.19 (m, 4H, SnOH2). IR (KBr, cm−1): v(O–H), 3372, v(COO)as, 1633, 1579; v(COO)s, 1337; v(Sn–O), 473; v(Sn–OH2), 485; v(Sn–C), 561; v(Sn–N), 497.
